fields.name: Average Sentence Length
fields.info: The average number of tokens in the model's responses.

fields.name: Distinct 1
fields.info: The number of unique unigrams in the model's responses divided by the total number of generated tokens.

fields.name: Distinct 2
fields.info: The number of unique bigrams in the model's responses divided by the total number of generated tokens.

fields.name: Embedding Greedy Match Score
fields.info: Greedy meatching between word embeddings of target utterance and model utterance (Rus et al., 2012).

fields.name: Embedding Extrema Score
fields.info: Vector extrema of a model's response token vectors (Forgues et al., 2014).

fields.name: Average Embedding Score
fields.info: Average of a model's responses token vectors.

fields.name: NCM
fields.description: In (Vinyals and Le 2015), human evaluation is conducted on a set of 200 hand-picked prompts. We make this dataset available for comparison.

fields.name: DBDC
fields.description: The Dialogue Breakdown Detection (DBDC) task is part of the Dialogue System Technology Challenge, a series of tasks for understanding human dialog.
